title: (真實美國法院案例)原來真係有美國人成功要中共還債券錢

replies.msg:
真係有美國嘅清朝鐵路債券持有人走去告中共。Russell Jackson 同另外嘅湖廣鐵路債券持有人入稟阿拉巴馬洲嘅法院。當時北京用有用國際法嘅sovereignty immunity，甚至就呢件件事出過外交照會，但可唔可以將豁免權嘅適用範圍擴展到商業活動都係爭議點之一。
(判辭全文: https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/FSupp/550/869/1451489/)

當時判辭寫點解可以搵中共攞錢嘅原因同背景係:

It is an established principle of international law that "[c]hanges in the government or the internal policy of a state do not as a rule affect its position in international law. A monarchy may be transformed into a republic, or a republic into a monarchy; absolute principles may be substituted for constitutional, or the reverse; but, though the government changes, the nation remains, with rights and obligations unimpaired." Lehigh Valley R. Co. v. State of Russia, 21 F.2d 396, 401 (2d Cir. 1927) (quoting Moore, Digest International Law, vol. 1, p. 249). The People's Republic of China is the successor government to the Imperial Chinese Government and, therefore, the successor to its obligations. The People's Republic of China has made no provision for payment of the principal due on the Hukuang bonds.

而最後嘅裁決竟然係:

Defendant, The People's Republic of China, has defaulted in this action. Its default was entered on October 22, 1981. The issue of the amount of damages sustained by the plaintiff class was submitted to the Court and the Court determined that plaintiffs suffered damages in the amount of Forty-One Million, Three-Hundred Thirteen Thousand, Thirty-Eight Dollars and 00/100 Cents ($41,313,038.00).

Pursuant to and in accordance with the Memorandum Opinion entered contemporaneously herewith, it is, therefore,
ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that plaintiffs recover the sum of $41,313,038.00 with interest thereon at the legal rate from and after the 1st day of September, 1982, together with costs of this action.

換言之，係影響到南京條約同北京條約前，中國都要處理埋以往起鐵路嘅債。再俾嘅話中國應該真係冇錢。

同時，如果唔俾即係承認自己不是大清同國民政府嘅繼承人，而香港就……屬於邊個都唔知，因為中共唔打算繼承大清政府嘅嘢。噤嘅話南京條約、北京條約、展拓新界界址專條同中英聯合聲明，以至香港回歸呢個事實都會俾「改寫」。因為香港主權不屬於中共而屬於國民政府、大清政府同英國，噤香港根本唔需要回歸。

嘩，係核彈!!

推

[重要]不要說黑警扮示威者擲汽油彈，試著說 警隊帶領群眾突破心理關口
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/1551617

我地spread fake news同對家有咩分別（不服來辯）

https://lih.kg/1551608

ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that plaintiffs recover the sum of $41,313,038.00 with interest thereon at the legal rate from and after the 1st day of September, 1982, together with costs of this action.

同時，如果唔俾即係承認自己不是大清同國民政府嘅繼承人，而香港就……屬於邊個都唔知，因為中共唔打算繼承大清政府嘅嘢。噤嘅話南京條約、北京條約、展拓新界界址專條同中英聯合聲明，以至香港回歸呢個事實都會俾「改寫」。因為香港主權不屬於中共而屬於國民政府、大清政府同英國，噤香港根本唔需要回歸。

嘩，係核彈!!

呢個先喺真真正正嘅END GAME
未清楚咩事可以睇下面

1。草案要求中國政府履行承諾，容許港人治港、高度自治，並且確保香港人可以通過普選，選出行政長官及立法會所有議席，當中特別設下「時限」，要求在2020年普選立法會。

2。特別警告香港若就23條立法，除非可證明不影響港人及外籍居民的人權，否則美國政府可中止《香港政策法》等。

這有助國際社會持續監察香港的狀況，如能每年通過查證，實際上等同美國年年為一國兩制投下信任一票，這一方面有助有助保障香港高度自治，同時亦會加強國際社會對香港的信心。

quote.msg:
真係有美國嘅清朝鐵路債券持有人走去告中共。Russell Jackson 同另外嘅湖廣鐵路債券持有人入稟阿拉巴馬洲嘅法院。當時北京用有用國際法嘅sovereignty immunity，甚至就呢件件事出過外交照會，但可唔可以將豁免權嘅適用範圍擴展到商業活動都係爭議點之一。
(判辭全文: https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/FSupp/550/869/1451489/)

當時判辭寫點解可以搵中共攞錢嘅原因同背景係:

It is an established principle of international law that "[c]hanges in the government or the internal policy of a state do not as a rule affect its position in international law. A monarchy may be transformed into a republic, or a republic into a monarchy; absolute principles may be substituted for constitutional, or the reverse; but, though the government changes, the nation remains, with rights and obligations unimpaired." Lehigh Valley R. Co. v. State of Russia, 21 F.2d 396, 401 (2d Cir. 1927) (quoting Moore, Digest International Law, vol. 1, p. 249). The People's Republic of China is the successor government to the Imperial Chinese Government and, therefore, the successor to its obligations. The People's Republic of China has made no provision for payment of the principal due on the Hukuang bonds.

而最後嘅裁決竟然係:

Defendant, The People's Republic of China, has defaulted in this action. Its default was entered on October 22, 1981. The issue of the amount of damages sustained by the plaintiff class was submitted to the Court and the Court determined that plaintiffs suffered damages in the amount of Forty-One Million, Three-Hundred Thirteen Thousand, Thirty-Eight Dollars and 00/100 Cents ($41,313,038.00).

Pursuant to and in accordance with the Memorandum Opinion entered contemporaneously herewith, it is, therefore,
ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that plaintiffs recover the sum of $41,313,038.00 with interest thereon at the legal rate from and after the 1st day of September, 1982, together with costs of this action.

換言之，係影響到南京條約同北京條約前，中國都要處理埋以往起鐵路嘅債。再俾嘅話中國應該真係冇錢。

同時，如果唔俾即係承認自己不是大清同國民政府嘅繼承人，而香港就……屬於邊個都唔知，因為中共唔打算繼承大清政府嘅嘢。噤嘅話南京條約、北京條約、展拓新界界址專條同中英聯合聲明，以至香港回歸呢個事實都會俾「改寫」。因為香港主權不屬於中共而屬於國民政府、大清政府同英國，噤香港根本唔需要回歸。

嘩，係核彈!!

支持,國軍好過共匪軍

而最後嘅裁決竟然係:

Defendant, The People's Republic of China, has defaulted in this action. Its default was entered on October 22, 1981. The issue of the amount of damages sustained by the plaintiff class was submitted to the Court and the Court determined that plaintiffs suffered damages in the amount of Forty-One Million, Three-Hundred Thirteen Thousand, Thirty-Eight Dollars and 00/100 Cents ($41,313,038.00).

Pursuant to and in accordance with the Memorandum Opinion entered contemporaneously herewith, it is, therefore,
ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that plaintiffs recover the sum of $41,313,038.00 with interest thereon at the legal rate from and after the 1st day of September, 1982, together with costs of this action.

換言之，係影響到南京條約同北京條約前，中國都要處理埋以往起鐵路嘅債。再俾嘅話中國應該真係冇錢。

同時，如果唔俾即係承認自己不是大清同國民政府嘅繼承人，而香港就……屬於邊個都唔知，因為中共唔打算繼承大清政府嘅嘢。噤嘅話南京條約、北京條約、展拓新界界址專條同中英聯合聲明，以至香港回歸呢個事實都會俾「改寫」。因為香港主權不屬於中共而屬於國民政府、大清政府同英國，噤香港根本唔需要回歸。

嘩，係核彈!!
